last_episode_to_air.name: The Lair
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Millán and Cardona finally close in on Santo's location, they draw everyone around them — including their loved ones — into danger.

name: Santo
overview: Two cops must learn to work together to catch the world's most-wanted drug dealer, whose face has never been revealed.

episodes.name: Invisible
episodes.overview: In Salvador de Bahía, Agent Cardona hopes Santo's mistress might reveal the narco's whereabouts. In Madrid, Inspector Millán tracks down a suspect.

episodes.name: Eyelids
episodes.overview: After being rescued in Madrid, Cardona tries to remember what happened to him and Bárbara while they were kidnapped. Millán investigates the Norwegians.

episodes.name: O Pai
episodes.overview: As Cardona recalls more about the terrifying rituals he endured while held hostage, Millán investigates one of Santo's men who was operating in Spain.

episodes.name: Os Filhos
episodes.overview: In the past, Cardona journeys to the depths of hell while working undercover in the cartel. In the present, he ends up in Millán's crosshairs.

episodes.name: Guilt
episodes.overview: Cardona and Bárbara try to evade police custody while Millán navigates an internal affairs investigation into his past conduct.

episodes.name: The Lair
episodes.overview: As Millán and Cardona finally close in on Santo's location, they draw everyone around them — including their loved ones — into danger.
